item.title: Spring
item.author: Author
item.description: Spring Notes Day 01. Basic Concepts Kernel Techs: IoC(Inversion of Control) and aop. Loose the Relationships between Modules. IoC ( Inversion of Control ) Creation, Value-Given and Management belong to the Containers beyond Codes. Management: Creation, Attributes-Given and Management of the Relationships of Objects. Inversion: Transfer the Rights of Management, Creation of Objects to the Containers ( here: Spring ) beyond Codes.
